categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This compound on the alps above the mining town of Jenith on Chelloa was the residence of the Sith Lord Daiman, ruler of the independent Daimanate princedom. While the Chelloan people toiled in hardship, he lived a secluded life of luxury. The compound was decorated with statues of Daiman engaged in various poses. It was raided twice by Jedi Knight Kerra Holt in 1032 BBY.
